translation.en: I want to go to Mars.
Because then I'd be living proof that life on Mars was possible.
translation.zh:
那样我就是火星上存在生命的
活生生的证明

translation.en: Proof that, if we had to,
translation.zh: 如有必要 那就证明给大家看

translation.en: mankind could make a fresh start.
We're in trouble, and it's our fault.
translation.zh: 我们正陷入困境 而且是我们的错

translation.en: And we're running out of time and Mother Nature doesn't negotiate.
translation.zh:
我们没有时间了
大自然也不会以我们的意志为转移

translation.en: Mars is a planet ripe and ready for life.
translation.zh:
定居火星的条件已成熟
并预备好了迎接新生命

translation.en: but there's one resource we must never neglect.
translation.zh: 但有一项资源我们绝不能忽视

translation.en: and it's the one without limits.
I wrote those words when I was 12 years old.
translation.zh: 我在12岁时写下那些文字

translation.en: My letter to the White House.
Never did I imagine the President would read them aloud to a nation
translation.zh: 万万没想到总统会大声朗读给全国

translation.en: mourning the loss of yet another crew of astronauts.
translation.zh: 哀悼又一组宇航员的牺牲

translation.en: that I would be proclaimed an emblem of fortitude,
translation.zh: 我会被宣布为坚韧的象征

translation.en: a young man with a singular vision
translation.zh: 一个独具远见的年轻男子
都要感谢创世纪太空技术

translation.en: in 20 hours the Magellan 61 will travel six astronauts to Mars,
translation.zh:
20小时后
麦哲伦61号会将六名宇航员送上火星

translation.en: not to visit, but to live there.
translation.zh: 不是参观 是在那里生活

translation.en: The first true citizens of Mars!
translation.zh: 第一批真正的火星公民！

translation.en: to the greatest space endeavor the world has ever attempted,
translation.zh: 到世界有史以来最伟大的太空探索

translation.en: the settlement known as East Texas, Mars.
translation.zh: 称为火星东德克萨斯州的移民地

translation.en: Come on, say it with me.

translation.zh:
-只要加水就够了
-加水就够了

translation.en: I cannot begin to compare to these six heroes,
translation.zh: 我无法和这六位英雄相提并论

translation.en: living examples of courage without limits.
translation.zh: 勇往直前的活生生例子

translation.en: I would like to hand things off
to the mission head of this historic expedition,
translation.zh: 交给本次历史性远征队的队长

translation.en: Sorry if we only have time for a couple of questions.
translation.zh: 抱歉我们只能回答几个问题

translation.en: You know what it's like the night before a trip.
translation.zh: 你也知道旅行前一晚是什么滋味

我是来自《航天时代》的
斯科特哈伯德

translation.en: how does it feel to sacrifice the next four years of your life to Mars?
translation.zh: 为了火星牺牲四年时间你有何感受？

translation.en: It's not a sacrifice. It's an opportunity.
translation.zh: 那不是牺牲 是个机会

translation.en: I feel humbled, excited, and grateful for the chance to be a pioneer.
translation.zh:
能有机会成为先驱者
为此感到谦卑、激动、感激

考虑到过去发生的事情
和将要面对的危险

translation.en: given the history, given the dangers?
I'm scared that I might let the mission down in some way.
translation.zh:
某些程度上
我害怕因为自己的原因令任务失败

translation.en: I was taught that people who took risks without fear were brave.
translation.zh:
我从小被教导说
无所畏惧的人是勇敢的

translation.en: Well, far braver are those that take risks despite their fear.
translation.zh:
但更勇敢的是那些
面对恐惧却勇于冒险的人

translation.en: Courage is fear that has said its prayers.
Stand by for docking to Mars transfer vehicle.
translation.zh: 准备对接火星转移发射器

translation.en: -Manual capture is confirmed. -Manual capture is confirmed.
translation.zh:
-确认人工接收
-确认人工接收

translation.en: Sarah, can I have a word?
translation.zh: 莎拉 能不能和你谈谈？

translation.en: We can't just turn the mission around, correct?
translation.zh: 我们无法改变任务 对吧？

translation.en: You mean, aside from being mortified?
translation.zh: 你的意思是除了感到窘迫外？

translation.en: Nathaniel, she's due shortly after they arrive.
translation.zh:
纳撒尼尔
他们到达后不久她就要生了

translation.en: We need to get out in front of this.
translation.zh: 我们必须提前做好准备
对于一个不负责任的太空员

translation.en: and NASA will make a decision what to do as soon as the baby's born.
translation.zh:
在婴孩出生后 美国宇航局
将作出决定该如何处理

translation.en: About when to bring them back.
translation.zh: 关于什么时候带他们归来
这里还有一个更大问题

translation.en: Subjecting a fetus to zero gravity during its entire gestation.
translation.zh: 胎儿整个怀孕期间得经历零重力
这是我们从未经历过的事件

translation.en: We do not go to press.
We keep this internal for now.
translation.zh: 目前只有在座各位得知此消息

translation.en: We need to gather more information.
translation.zh: 我们需要收集更多资料

translation.en: I'm saying we go short-term contingency.
translation.zh: 我是说 我们将短暂应急

translation.en: We have Dr. Loh deliver the baby on Mars.
translation.zh: 罗医生可以在火星为婴儿接生

translation.en: We keep this quiet. We... we wait this out.
translation.zh: 我们保持安静 等待事情进一步发展

translation.en: but she's no longer just an astronaut
translation.zh:
但她现在的身份
已经不单单是一个宇航员了

translation.en: and it's not just a Genesis decision.
translation.zh: 这也不光是创世纪计划能决定的

translation.en: -All right, go ahead, push. -Take a deep breath. Push!
translation.zh:
-继续 用力
-很好 深呼吸 用力

translation.en: Good. Right, big, deep breath. Here we go.
Great, you're doing great. Keep breathing.
translation.zh: 继续深呼吸 你做得很好

translation.en: -You're doing great. - And, go! One final push!
-Here we go, come on, big, deep breath. -Go!

translation.zh:
-你做到了 很好
-是的 很好
做得好 他看起来很棒

translation.en: Sarah? Her heart rate is dropping.
-She's still not responding. -Give her 20 milligrams of...

translation.zh: 加油 莎拉 呼吸

translation.en: Two-thirds less gravity will alter the child's internal organs.
translation.zh:
在少于三分之二的地球重力下
会改变孩子的内脏

translation.en: The heart will simply not be conditioned
to have the strength to pump in the Earth's gravity.
translation.zh: 心脏根本没有足够跳动的力量

translation.en: Bones will be brittle, probably oversized.
translation.zh: 骨头会变脆 很可能会生长过大

translation.en: The child would never survive the trip back to Earth.
translation.zh: 婴儿不可能活过返回地球之旅

translation.en: Yeah, but, Nathaniel, in the eyes of the world,
isn't this whole mission, East Texas, an experiment?
translation.zh:
这整个“东德州任务”
不就是个实验吗？

translation.en: Tom, this isn't a mouse. This is not a... monkey.
translation.zh: 汤姆 这不是老鼠 也不是猴子

translation.en: and in the eyes of the world
the lead astronaut of the Genesis Mars Mission
translation.zh: 创世纪火星任务的宇航员领队

translation.en: not only got pregnant, but died in childbirth,
translation.zh: 不止怀孕 还死于难产

translation.en: sentencing a baby to a motherless existence in outer space!
translation.zh:
让她自幼失恃的婴儿
独自在外太空求生

translation.en: East Texas runs on money, science, good faith,

translation.zh: 重要的是 良好的公共关系

translation.en: We're not only talking about a secret, we're talking about a cover-up.
translation.zh: 我们谈的不只是保密 还要掩盖事实

translation.en: It will bring the company down.
Unless we don't cover up, we take full responsibility.
translation.zh: 除非我们不掩盖 我们承担全责

translation.en: I wanna be on the next mission.
Nathaniel, for the love of Go-- Here we go.
translation.zh: 纳撒尼尔 拜托 你又来了

translation.en: There would be no better show of support.
translation.zh: 没有比这更好的表达支持的方法了
谢谢你 爱丽丝 没错

translation.en: You can imagine their morale right now.
translation.zh: 你可以想象得出他们士气有多低落

translation.en: Nathaniel, it is out of the question.
Doctor, will you enlighten Alice, please?
translation.zh: 医生 请解释给爱丽丝听好吗？

translation.en: We found it on Mr. Shepherd's very first medical.
translation.zh:
我们是在谢泼德先生的
第一次医疗检验时发现的

-一种先天的大脑功能紊乱
-基本上是良性

translation.en: Benign, unless he wants to go into outer space, and then nobody knows--
translation.zh:
但除非他想进入外太空
然后结果如何就…

translation.en: And what if I'm willing to take that risk?
So, the child remains on Mars?
translation.zh: 那孩子就留在火星上吗？

translation.en: Say we give up everything we fought for.
translation.zh: 假设我们放弃我们为之奋斗的一切

translation.en: Say we bring everyone home. You heard the doctor.
translation.zh:
假设我们把大家带回家
你也听医生说了

translation.en: The child wouldn't even make the trip.
translation.zh: 那孩子无法挨过回程的路

translation.en: Keeping this a secret saves the company,
which saves East Texas, which saves the child.
translation.zh: 也救了“东德州” 也就是救了孩子
所以婴儿的存在仍然是机密？

translation.en: Can I bring your car around, Mr. Shepherd?
translation.zh: 要我把您的车开来吗 谢泼德先生？
降低速度 危险 超速

translation.en: Centaur, can you make me a map?
translation.zh: 人马兽 请给我地图

translation.en: And what is it you'd like a map of, Gardner Elliot?
translation.zh:
你想要怎么样的地图
加德纳埃利奥特？

translation.en: A pathway through the ventilation system
translation.zh: 从我住处的通风系统前往

translation.en: from my quarters to the storage facility on East Texas.
translation.zh: 东德州的存储设施的一条通道

translation.en: And why would you like that information?
translation.zh: 你为什么需要这条资讯？

translation.en: It is my business. I'm your best friend.
translation.zh: 肯定有关 我是你最好朋友

translation.en: No. You're a machine with rudimentary artificial intelligence.
translation.zh: 不 你是有基本人工智能的机器

translation.en: A machine which I helped to build.
translation.zh: 一个我帮忙制作出来的机器

translation.en: I do have feelings. I'm your best friend.
translation.zh: 我的确有感觉 我是你最好的朋友

translation.en: I'm your teacher. I'm your homey. Hug it out.
translation.zh: 我是你的老师 我是你老友 来抱抱

translation.en: Get me a map of the ventilation system.

translation.zh: 我是你朋友 加德纳 停

translation.en: Once upon a time, deep in the 15 acre wood,
translation.zh: 从前 在1500平方米的森林里

translation.en: Flopsy found Owl sitting on his doorstep.
translation.zh: 青蛙发现猫头鹰坐在它家门口

translation.en: The flood had taken away his entire house...
translation.zh: 洪水已经夺走了他的家…
人马兽 看看谁绕过了东德州

translation.en: the East Texas infrastructure firewall program.
We're running out of time and...

translation.zh: 大自然也不接受人为改变

translation.en: Letter to the White House, and he's 12 years old, blah, blah...
translation.zh: 给白宫的信 他才12岁

translation.en: -Sorry if we only have time... -Hey, Mom.
translation.zh:
-抱歉我们只能回答
-嗨 妈

translation.en: You know what it's like the night before a trip.
translation.zh: 你也知道旅行前一晚是什么滋味

translation.en: Colony 52 Bravo, report to the automatic air lock.
translation.zh:
52号殖民地二号
请至自动空气闸门前报道

translation.en: Colony 52 Bravo, report to the automatic air lock.
translation.zh:
52号殖民地二号
请至自动空气闸门前报道

translation.en: Have you seen this? I mean...
It's just... so cool. I mean...
Works better if you turn it on.
By the way, I can't reach Centaur.
translation.zh: 顺便提一下 我联络不上人马兽

translation.en: What have you done with him this time?
translation.zh: 这一次你又对它做了什么？

translation.en: Are you checking up on me?

translation.zh:
-给 凯德拉
-谢谢 托尼

translation.en: No. I'm checking up on Centaur.
Yeah, who checks up on me.
translation.zh: 是啊 谁会盯着我呢？

translation.en: You don't fool me, Gardner Elliot.
translation.zh: 你骗不了我 加德纳艾略特
我们会让你成为不可或缺的人物

-什么？
-如果没人知道我的存在

translation.en: if no one knows I exist?
translation.zh: 我又如何才能成为不可或缺的人？

translation.en: You want it? Get it! Go fetch!
What would you do without me?
All you ever ask for is privacy these days.
I remember a time when you and I--
Just dealing with the basic people of the school.

translation.zh: 没人是真心的 知道吗？

translation.en: My best friend isn't even real.
translation.zh: 我最好的朋友也不是真的

translation.en: Anyway, the second I turn 18, I am so outta here.
translation.zh: 无论如何 我一到18岁就会离开

-解放
-解放 流动性 音乐

translation.en: Are you making fun of me, Gardner?
translation.zh: 你在开我的玩笑 加德纳？

translation.en: I just wish I could go with you.
translation.zh: 我只不过希望能和你一起去

translation.en: You've been saying that since last summer. And you can.
translation.zh:
从去年夏天起你一直在说
你可以去的

translation.en: Oh, right. You can't leave your house.
It's not a house, it's a penthouse on Park Avenue.
translation.zh:
不只是一间普通的屋子
是公园大道上的大平层

translation.en: I can't leave because of my disease.
translation.zh: 我因为我的病所以无法离开
行吧 可我还是不相信你

translation.en: Wouldn't your foster dad be unhappy?
Yeah. No more checks from the state.
translation.zh:
是不开心
再也不给我从州政府寄支票了

translation.en: Study lab is over. Gotta go.
translation.zh: 上课时间过了 我该走了

translation.en: See you in the funny papers.
You always say that. What does it mean?
translation.zh: 你一直那么说 那是什么意思？

translation.en: I don't know. I had a foster sister in Oklahoma who used to say it all the time.
translation.zh:
不知道 我那住在俄克拉何马州的
继妹常这么说

translation.en: Just a different way of saying goodbye. I like it.
translation.zh: 说再见的另类方式而已 我蛮喜欢的

translation.en: One of the German scientists who was here last month left it behind.
translation.zh: 上个月来的德国科学家留下的

translation.en: How do you know what's going on?
You see those men there? They're angels.
translation.zh: 看到那些男人吗？他们是天使

translation.en: They look over the people on Earth and make sure they're okay.
translation.zh: 他们守护世上的人 确保他们平安

translation.en: He's gonna fall in love with her and...
Then he won't be an angel anymore.
translation.zh: 那样的话他就不再是天使了

translation.en: Hey, Tulsa, give us a ride, you slut!
translation.zh: 图萨 送我们一程吧 你这婊子！

translation.en: I got a Harley you can ride.
"Hey, honey, how was your day? You make any new friends yet?"
translation.zh:
亲爱的 今天过得如何？
交了新朋友吗？

translation.en: Oh, you bet. Boy, am I fighting them off.
translation.zh: 当然 他们太热情 我好不容易才挣脱

translation.en: I'm the most popular girl in my class.
translation.zh: 我是班上最受欢迎的女孩

translation.en: Hey, did you get Thursday's check yet? 'Cause I wouldn't want you--
translation.zh:
你收到了星期四的支票吗？
因为我不愿你…

translation.en: Wait a second, it's Thursday! Chuck!
translation.zh: 等等 今天是星期四 查克

translation.en: You gotta do the Sanders farm.
translation.zh: 你得到桑德斯农场工作

translation.en: Listen to me. You have one single property.
translation.zh: 听我说 你只有一样财产

translation.en: It's pretty simple, all right? Fifteen minutes, tops.
translation.zh: 很简单 知道吗？最多15分钟

translation.en: -Let's try the brakes. -It doesn't have brakes.
All right. Now, check the sprays.
translation.zh: 好 现在检查喷雾剂

translation.en: -Check. -Not while I'm standing behind the plane!
translation.zh:
-检查完毕
-不是当我站在飞机后面时！

translation.en: Okay, we are gonna lose another property.
translation.zh:
行了
再这样我们会失去另一处地产的
家长教育真棒 真的

translation.en: Good to know what my life's worth to you!
translation.zh: 总算知道我的命对你来说值多少钱了
你没事的 我就在这里

translation.en: Do you think the exit protocol doesn't apply to you?
translation.zh: 你认为离舱协议对你不适用？

translation.en: You could've caused an atmospheric breach,
translation.zh: 你有可能造成大气层裂口的

translation.en: Nobody rides unaccompanied, no matter who they are!
translation.zh:
没有人能独自驾车外出
无论他们是谁！

translation.en: Gardner, what's going on here? This isn't like you.
translation.zh: 加德纳 这是怎么回事？这不像你

translation.en: You wouldn't understand. My mother's out there.
translation.zh: 你不会明白 我妈妈在外面

translation.en: How did you get past the electronic lock?
translation.zh: 你是如何闯过电子锁的？

translation.en: Okay, that magnetic implant is there to monitor the growth of your organs,
translation.zh:
好 那磁性植入物是用来
监控你器官生长的

translation.en: And how did you even learn how to do that?
translation.zh: 况且你究竟是如何做到的？

translation.en: it's just a piece of metal in the ground, okay?
translation.zh: 只是地上一块金属 知道吗？

translation.en: Her ashes were spread across the Pacific Ocean.
translation.zh: 她的骨灰已被洒在太平洋
她不在外面 加德纳

translation.en: I don't like to go to sleep with us in a fight.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢在我们吵架后入睡

translation.en: This is how you greet an old friend?
translation.zh: 这是你和老朋友打招呼的方法？
如果是不请自来的朋友 是的

translation.en: Mr. Shepherd, you have no idea how smart he is.
translation.zh: 谢泼德先生 你真不知道他有多聪明
他被剥夺了与周围人的联系

translation.en: Not to do this, at this point...
translation.zh: 在这时候 不该这样…

translation.en: I'm sorry, but it would be inhumane.
translation.zh: 抱歉 但这很不人道

translation.en: Miss Wyndham, I'm touched by your concern, I really am.
translation.zh: 温德姆小姐 我被你的关怀感动 真的

translation.en: But none of this matters if he can't survive.
translation.zh: 但如果他活不了 那一切都是徒劳
我们已经讨论过这一话题了

translation.en: For starters, we would have to add carbon nanotubes
translation.zh: 首先 我们必须添加碳纳米管

translation.en: It's... it's too risky. I'm sorry.
Tom, I can't sign on to this.
translation.zh: 汤姆 我无法签这个

translation.en: With all due respect, Nathaniel, I'm not asking.
translation.zh:
恕我直言 纳撒尼尔
我不是在好言相求

translation.en: I'm telling. You've been gone for 16 years.
translation.zh: 是正式通知你 你离开了16年

translation.en: -You've dropped off the face of the Earth. -Have you run this by NASA?
translation.zh:
-你彻底消失了
-你经过美国航空局批准了吗？

translation.en: NASA has always felt conflicted over this.
translation.zh:
美国航空局一直以来
都认为这是一个棘手的事情

translation.en: They wanna do the right thing, which this is.
translation.zh: 他们想做正确的事 就是现在这个

translation.en: They wanna bring the boy home.
Look, this is our chance to turn bad PR into good PR.
translation.zh: 这就是我们转变公众形象的机会

translation.en: Wait a minute, this has nothing to do with PR.
translation.zh: 等等 这和公关无关

translation.en: I'm talking about a boy's life.
translation.zh: 我在说的是一个男孩的一生

translation.en: Like it or not, I'm still the founder.
translation.zh: 不管你喜欢与否 我还是创始人

translation.en: Like it or not, East Texas is still my brainchild.
translation.zh:
不管你喜欢与否
东德克州仍是我的心血

translation.en: You know, you've got a lot more faith in how the public will respond than I do.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
在公众反应问题上 你比我更有信心
你要带我去波拉波拉岛？

translation.en: That was a joke. As you were.
They may have found a cure for my disease.
translation.zh: 他们可能找到医治我的方法了

translation.en: Okay, mine was closer to the truth.
translation.zh: 好吧 我刚才的玩笑还比较贴近事实

translation.en: You got it. Keep going. There you go.
translation.zh: 做得对 继续走 就是这样

translation.en: There's a lot of travel involved.
Once foster care spits me out, I'm gone.
translation.zh: 一旦寄养机构把我踢走 我就完了

translation.en: See you in the funny papers.

translation.zh: 文件32号 人类的求爱

translation.en: Here we are. Allow me, won't you?
translation.zh: 我们到了 请容许我代劳

translation.en: Well, I guess chivalry's not entirely dead.
translation.zh: 我想绅士精神还没消失殆尽
至少楠塔基特岛上还有
至少楠塔基特岛上还有

translation.en: -Allow me, won't you? -Allow me, won't you?
translation.zh:
-请容许我代劳
-请容许我代劳

translation.en: Well, I guess chivalry's not entirely dead.
translation.zh: 我想绅士精神还没消失殆尽

-绅士精神倒没消失殆尽
-至少楠塔基特岛上还有

translation.en: -At least not in Nantucket. -At least not in Nantucket.
translation.zh:
-绅士精神倒没消失殆尽
-至少楠塔基特岛上还有 至少楠塔基特岛上还有

translation.en: Are you gonna visit your ex-husband?
translation.zh: 你会去探望你的前夫吗？

translation.en: I hacked into the scientist records.
translation.zh: 我入侵了科学家记录的服务器

translation.en: Aren't you the clever computer stalker?
Well, he changed when we found out I couldn't have children.
translation.zh: 他发现我无法怀孕后就变了

translation.en: Did that make you sad? That you couldn't have children?
translation.zh: 你无法怀孕 这让你伤心吗？

translation.en: It meant I didn't have to choose.
translation.zh: 意味着我不需要去做选择

translation.en: And... motherhood wasn't a dream I was chasing at that time.
translation.zh: 那时候成为母亲还不是我的梦想

translation.en: My father is somewhere on that thing.
translation.zh: 我爸爸就在那东西的某处

translation.en: We could go and find him.
We don't have to tell him who I am. I could just see him, you know?
translation.zh: 不需要告诉他我是谁 我就见他一面

translation.en: Maybe I could ask for the time.
translation.zh: 也许我能够申请到时间去见他

translation.en: Do you know where he lives?
Gardner, I promise, I don't know anything about him.
translation.zh:
加德纳 我向你保证
我不知道他的底细

translation.en: How am I supposed to act on Earth?
translation.zh: 在地球上我该如何表现？
怎么和地球上的人互动？

translation.en: Excuse me, sir. Do you have an appointment? Sir!
translation.zh: 对不起 先生 你有预约吗？先生

translation.en: No, what's impossible is shuttling back and forth to Mars!
translation.zh: 不 不可能的是来回穿梭火星

translation.en: What's impossible is building our salvation there,
translation.zh: 不可能的是在那里构建我们的新世界

translation.en: but I made those things happen!
So don't tell me what's impossible!
translation.zh: 所以别告诉我有什么不可能

translation.en: Gardner, how are you feeling? Water!
-No. Not thirs-- -Let's get this back on.
I believe the term is euphoria.
translation.zh: 我相信正确的词语是兴喜若狂

translation.en: It's to protect you from us, not us from you.
translation.zh: 是为了保护你 而不是保护我们
同样的密室 不同的星球
也没什么改变 有吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I just... I just weigh so much.
translation.zh: 我很好 我只是感觉很重

translation.en: If you'll stop here and turn around.
translation.zh: 如果你停下来看看四周

translation.en: I got so many questions about Mars.
Not as many as I have about Earth.
What's your favorite thing about Earth?
translation.zh: 你最喜欢地球上什么东西？

translation.en: What's your favorite thing to do on Mars?
translation.zh: 在火星上你最喜欢做的事？

translation.en: My turn. Did you see my mother die?
translation.zh: 到我 你是否见证了我母亲的死亡？
你 你很容易让人放下戒心

translation.en: -Are you gonna keep going out of turn? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-你还要继续不按顺序问我吗？
-是的

translation.en: So what's going to be of some concern
are these inconsistencies in this last batch of tests.
translation.zh:
是最后一批测试中
显示出不一致的地方

translation.en: -What about blood? -Blood work is virtually normal.
-But if we're going to be su-- -Virtually?
Is that what we do around here now? Virtually?
translation.zh: 几乎？难道我们如今就这么马虎吗？

translation.en: Because I like to think the importance of our work
translation.zh: 我认为我们在工作中需要恪守的

-意思是？
-意思是 肌钙蛋白

translation.en: Testing for troponin is my point.
translation.zh: 检测肌钙蛋白是我观点

translation.en: Run the test for troponin, please.
They need to do more tests.
They already did their tests. They said I'm fine.
translation.zh: 他们已经做过了 他们说我没事

translation.en: -I know. -I mean, I'm more than fine.
They're sending me back to Mars, aren't they?
translation.zh: 他们要把我送回火星吧？

translation.en: -They didn't say that. -Well, they don't have to.
translation.zh:
-他们没这么说
-他们其实不需要

translation.en: Word of warning, guys. These are the real deal.
translation.zh: 各位 提醒一句 这些都是真实的

translation.en: The boots are weighted for gravity compensation,
translation.zh:
为补偿重力影响
靴子的重量已进行过调整

translation.en: as if you were from Mars returning to Earth.
translation.zh: 适用于从火星返回地球的人

translation.en: It's going to feel very different.
I don't believe this. He's tipped the pressure!
translation.zh: 我无法相信 他反转了压力

translation.en: Lock it down. This is not a drill!
translation.zh: 封锁大楼 这不是演习

translation.en: Zone H. He's headed to Service.
translation.zh: H区 他前往后勤去了

translation.en: Okay, guys, check the loading dock.
I have to talk to you.
Gardner trusts me, he doesn't trust you.
translation.zh: 加德纳相信我 他不相信你
凯德拉 给我点时间

translation.en: We need teams at the Washington Avenue Amtrak Station,
translation.zh:
我们需要派遣行动小组
到华盛顿大道美铁站

translation.en: the airport, and cover the bus stations, yeah?
translation.zh: 机场还有巴士车站 知道吗？

translation.en: Kendra, thank you, but I am good.
State police are helping with blockades.
They've been told he needs a heart transplant
translation.zh: 他们已被告知他需要心脏移植

translation.en: and a donor's suddenly become available.
translation.zh: 然后突然有了一个合适的捐献者

translation.en: I promise I will keep you updated.
translation.zh: 我保证会及时通知你事情进展

translation.en: You claim to be concerned about Gardner's health,
translation.zh: 你声称要关心加德纳的状况

translation.en: but I think you care more about keeping him secret.
translation.zh: 但我认为你更关心守住他这个秘密
他在四辆救护车中的一辆

translation.en: This fire, it's so... it's so warm.
Do you know where Colorado is?
translation.zh: 你知不知道科罗拉多州在哪里？

translation.en: Greyhound station is about a three iron in that direction.
translation.zh:
灰狗车站在那个方向
离这大概三号铁杆能打出的距离远
高尔夫术语 你也玩吗？

translation.en: What's your favorite thing about Earth?
translation.zh: 你最喜欢地球上的什么东西？

translation.en: What's your favorite thing about Earth?
translation.zh: 你最喜欢地球上的什么东西？

translation.en: How do we know for sure he's going to see her?
translation.zh: 我们如何肯定他一定会去见她？

translation.en: Because she's the only person he knows on Earth.
translation.zh: 因为她是地球上他唯一认识的人

translation.en: All right. Read that to me.
She was left at the Tulsa Oklahoma Child Welfare Services
when she was four years old.
translation.zh: 图萨俄克拉何马州儿童福利服务

translation.en: A girl named Tulsa happened to be abandoned in Tulsa?
translation.zh: 一个叫图萨的女孩刚好被弃在图萨？

translation.en: She's lived in five foster homes over the last 12 years.
translation.zh: 过去的12年里她住过五个寄养家庭

translation.en: He told her he was confined to a Park Avenue penthouse
translation.zh:
他告诉她
他被限制在一个公园大道的大平层里

translation.en: Put the address in the SatTrack.
translation.zh: 将地址输入卫星追踪系统

translation.en: We'll land close, but not too close.
translation.zh: 我们将登陆附近 但不会太靠近

translation.en: Why did you ghost me like that?

translation.zh:
-失踪？
-是的 你完全不理我

translation.en: You didn't return any of my messages.
translation.zh: 你连我一个消息都不回

translation.en: I told you, I was taking a trip.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 我会出远门

translation.en: For seven months? People have phones, you know?
It was a... It was a very specific type of travel.
Very specific type of travel? Who even talks like that?
translation.zh: 非常特殊的行程？谁会那样说话？

translation.en: Tulsa, can you slow down? This gravity is very heavy.
translation.zh: 图萨 能不能慢点 引力很重

translation.en: I'm sorry that this is heavy for you,
but I really do not appreciate
translation.zh: 但我真不能接受被无视

translation.en: being blown off by the one person who I don't--
Tulsa, I would never... ghost on you.
translation.zh:
图萨
我绝不会无缘无故对你不理不睬

translation.en: Okay, I've actually gone through quite a lot to get here.
translation.zh: 事实上我经历很多才来到这里

translation.en: You're taller than I thought you'd be.
You're meaner than I thought you'd be.
What are you wearing? This is so weird.
Look, I have a lab, okay? So, I don't know.
translation.zh: 听着 我有课要上 那个

translation.en: Can you just stay here, all right?
And those were the highlights of the 19th century Industrial Revolution.
translation.zh: 这些都是19世纪工业革命的亮点

translation.en: Now, the 20th century had some of the greatest inventions--
translation.zh: 现在20世纪有一些最伟大的发明…
你来自何处 加德纳？

translation.en: I don't think I have you on my roster.

translation.zh: 好 各位 电话、留声机

translation.en: -I told you to wait for me. -Movie camera, light bulb...
translation.zh:
-我叫你等我了
-电影摄像机、灯泡

translation.en: -I've waited long enough. -Four inventions, one father.
translation.zh:
-我等太久了
-全来自一个发明之父

translation.en: Good. Give me one fact about Thomas Edison.
translation.zh:
很好 谁告诉我关于
托马斯爱迪生的一件事？

translation.en: but it was Nikola Tesla who invented alternating current.
translation.zh: 但交流电是尼古拉特斯拉发明的

translation.en: Edison got jealous and claimed AC electrocuted pets.
translation.zh:
爱迪生嫉妒不已
并声称交流电是四不像

translation.en: To prove it, he electrocuted an elephant.
translation.zh: 为证明他的话 他电死了一只大象

translation.en: That's not badass. That's a... bad person.
translation.zh: 那不是利害 那是害人精

translation.en: You see, folks? You learn something new every day.
translation.zh: 看见吧？每天都能学到新知识

translation.en: Excuse me. That's our emergency eye wash station!
translation.zh: 抱歉 那是我们紧急洗眼中心

translation.en: So the operation worked. You're all better now?
translation.zh: 所以手术很成功 现在你都好了？

translation.en: Tell me where you're really from.
translation.zh: 告诉我你真正来自何处

translation.en: All right, fine. Don't tell me.
translation.zh: 好 算了 别告诉我

translation.en: What for? It wasn't your fault.
It was mine. I killed her.
You're gonna help me find him.
I don't know where he is, but...
translation.zh: 我不知道他在哪里 但…

translation.en: Well, you have your father's smile.
translation.zh: 你遗传了你父亲的笑容
14号路线 北纬40度 东经34度

translation.en: Gardner, you need to come with me now!
translation.zh: 加德纳 现在你必须跟我来！

translation.en: You're putting yourself in great danger!
translation.zh: 你正让自己处于极大的危险中！

translation.en: Why can't you just leave me alone?
translation.zh: 你为什么就不肯放过我？

translation.en: -Come on. Just come with us. -I'm going to find my father.
translation.zh:
-来吧 跟我们走
-我要去找父亲

translation.en: Officer, is there another way around?
That's not true. You have me.
translation.zh: 那不是真的 你还有我
凯德拉 你自己告诉我

translation.en: Gardner, that's not what I meant. You know that.
translation.zh: 加德纳 我不是那个意思 你知道的

translation.en: And I'm sorry you had to raise me at all!
Okay. All right, you're gonna need to get in.
Come on! Come on, get in.
All right, you may wanna hop in.
translation.zh: 好 也许你该坐下来了
加德纳 拜托 坐下

translation.en: You know how to fly this, right?

translation.zh: 不 加德纳 机油压力！

translation.en: My God, they're landing on a freeway.
translation.zh:
我的天
他们要降落在一条高速公路上

translation.en: Okay, all right... it's gonna be a little tricky.
translation.zh: 好 好吧 会有点棘手

translation.en: I usually have a landing strip.
translation.zh: 我通常都降落在跑道上

translation.en: We're gonna have to jump. Let's jump!
translation.zh: 我们只好跳了 跳吧！

translation.en: All right, we gotta go. Come on!
translation.zh: 好 我们该走了 快点

translation.en: The fellas went through the wreckage with a fine-tooth comb.
translation.zh: 他们已详细搜索了残骸
一个任务 就是保护加德纳！

translation.en: To keep him from making contact with the outside world.
translation.zh: 就是防止他与外界接触

translation.en: Preventing exactly this kind of eventuality.
translation.zh: 防止类似现在这样的事件

translation.en: I admired you more than anyone.
And you wanna know what? We've been shouldering East Texas for you.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
我们一直在为你承担东德州的重任

translation.en: What are you trying to say, Kendra?
translation.zh: 你想说什么 凯德拉？

translation.en: I'm trying to say the whole mission was your job, your responsibility.
translation.zh:
我想说整个任务
是你的工作、你的责任

translation.en: When's the Beemer gonna be ready?
All right. Well, can you get the paperwork started?
translation.zh: 好 那么能否开始办理手续？

translation.en: How do you suppose we find your father?
translation.zh: 你认为我们该如何找到你父亲？

translation.en: You got the paperwork on this BMW?
translation.zh: 你有这辆宝马的文件吗？

translation.en: You know, right and wrong seem to change when you really need something.
translation.zh:
当你迫切需要达成某事时
对与错之间的界限似乎不是那么明显
别担心 我会去拿的
任何不容易被跟踪的地方

translation.en: when you said that you killed your mother,
what exactly did you mean by that?
She died giving birth to me.
That doesn't mean that you killed her.
He founded East Texas. Where I'm from.
translation.zh: 他创立了“东德州” 我来自那里

translation.en: Well, I thought you said you were from New York.
translation.zh: 我以为你说你来自纽约

translation.en: You know, I don't like to be played, Gardner.
People have been lying to me my entire life,
translation.zh: 我整个人生 人们一直在骗我
也无所谓 因为人就是卑鄙的
他们卑鄙 他们骗人

translation.en: They use you to get what they want,
translation.zh: 他们利用你得到想要的东西后

translation.en: and then they just throw you away.
And the thing is, I didn't even like calculus.
translation.zh: 而且我根本不喜欢微积分

translation.en: No, it's just Mr. Hall's always drunk
translation.zh: 不 豪尔先生总是喝醉

translation.en: and nobody can understand what he's saying,
but he doesn't care what we do on our computers.
translation.zh: 但他不关心我们用电脑做些什么

translation.en: -Tulsa... -So that's what I looked forward to.
translation.zh:
-图萨
-所以那就是我期待的事

translation.en: -Tulsa, I'm not... -To calculus. To talking to you.
translation.zh:
-图萨 我不…
-上微积分课 因为能和你聊天

translation.en: Tulsa, I'm not lying to you.
My mother was an astronaut. She made a mistake.
translation.zh: 我妈妈是宇航员 她犯了错

translation.en: Just because people lied to you before, it doesn't mean I'm lying now.
translation.zh:
就因为别人曾骗了你
不代表我在骗你

translation.en: And just because something sounds crazy to you,
translation.zh: 就因为某事听起来疯狂

translation.en: So, if you really wanna get rid of me, you have to get out.
translation.zh:
所以如果你真的想摆脱我
你必须出去

translation.en: Because I'm gonna find my father.
when people talk to me that way, they get their ass kicked.
translation.zh:
别人这样和我说话时
通常没有好结果
我已可以驾驭地球的引力了

translation.en: Okay. Maybe you actually believe it yourself.
translation.zh: 好吧 也许其实是你相信自己
因为人们做的卑鄙事情
绅士精神还没消失殆尽
至少楠塔基特岛上还有

translation.en: I'm on a road trip with an insane person.
translation.zh: 我和一个疯子踏上了旅程

translation.en: We should not be doing this.
Well, we need a device that's not being traced.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个无法被追踪的设备

translation.en: You wanna know where your father is, right?
translation.zh: 你想知道你爸爸在哪里吧？

translation.en: Well, there was a Sarah Elliot who was an astronaut.
translation.zh: 的确有个叫莎拉埃利奥特的宇航员

translation.en: from pressure suit failure shortly after arriving.
Yeah. Of course you are. And I'm an enigma.
translation.zh: 你当然是 而我就是个谜

translation.en: -I know. That's what I've been-- -Damn it! We lost connection.
translation.zh:
-我知道 我一直…
-靠！断网了
是的 他们还蛮吝啬的

translation.en: Your best option is disabling all the decoys
translation.zh: 最好的办法就是取消所有的连接

translation.en: and piggybacking off the firehouse next door.
translation.zh: 再去蹭隔壁消防站的网

translation.en: Pay for my wrap and I won't tell.
translation.zh: 替我付饭钱 我就闭口不提

translation.en: No, we don't have money. Sorry.
translation.zh: 不 我们没有钱对不起

translation.en: Great. Why don't you say that louder?
translation.zh: 很好 为什么不说大声点？
抱歉 他不明白我在讽刺他

translation.en: My mother was wearing this when she died.
translation.zh: 我妈妈去世时戴着这个

translation.en: It's... it's some sort of ring, I think.
It's like half a ring. Part of a bigger ring?
translation.zh: 像半个戒指 大点的戒指的一部分？

translation.en: There's words on it. Let's see.
translation.zh: 上面有文字 我们看看
亚利桑那州的一个印第安部落
“两个半的团聚 爱情、永恒”
对 签名是萨满奈卡

translation.en: Gardner, I think this is some kind of wedding ring.
translation.zh: 加德纳 我想这是结婚戒指

translation.en: And he married them. That's Shaman Neka.
translation.zh: 他替他们主持的婚礼 这是萨满奈卡

translation.en: All right. How far is Arizona?
Not smiling. Running. Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 不笑了 快跑 我们走

translation.en: We think they're still in there.
translation.zh: 我们认为他们仍在那里

translation.en: And the greater the pressure to reemerge, the more I retreated.
translation.zh: 当压力越大 我就越退缩

translation.en: As long as he was just a face on the screen, I could almost handle it,
translation.zh:
当他只是屏幕上的一个脸时
我还可以应付

translation.en: sentencing a boy to a life he never asked for.
translation.zh:
强塞给一个男孩
他从未主动要求过的命运

translation.en: But it's like the malignancy of any secret, it just kept getting worse.
Every time I go over it, what I did, the choices I made,
translation.zh:
每当我重新回想我的所作所为
我做出的选择

translation.en: I swear, I couldn't have done anything else.

translation.zh: 这个问题我已经处理过了

translation.en: I just had no idea what the solution would do to me.
translation.zh: 只是不知道解决方案带给我的影响

translation.en: I need to make this right.
Gardner's blood has elevated levels of troponin.
translation.zh: 加德纳的血液中肌钙蛋白浓度很高

translation.en: The news is not good, Kendra.
translation.zh: 凯德拉 这是个坏消息
告诉我有关肌钙蛋白的事
高度肌钙蛋白和加德纳

translation.en: It's not necessarily a problem on its own,
but in conjunction with elevated levels of troponin...
translation.zh: 但结合高度肌钙蛋白后…

translation.en: He's suffering from an enlarged heart.
His heart can't handle our atmosphere.
translation.zh: 他的心脏无法承受我们的大气层压力

-图萨 那里有个气球！
-是的

translation.en: Tulsa, there's a balloon up there!
translation.zh: 图萨 上面有个气球！

translation.en: You really gotta slow down. That's your fifth?
translation.zh: 你真该吃慢点 第五个了？

translation.en: Can you check in there, just see if there's any cash?
translation.zh: 能不能看看里面是否还有现金？

translation.en: Travelers always stash away a few bucks.
No, that's for your mouth. You just gotta blow in it.
translation.zh: 不 那是放在嘴的 你只需要吹它

translation.en: You got a schmutz on your face.
Relax, this place has like a million stores and a trillion dollars.
translation.zh:
放心 这地方有无数间店铺
他们日进斗金 不缺钱

translation.en: No, there are cameras. All right.
translation.zh:
-不行 有监控摄像头
-好吧

translation.en: But, look, this is the last of our money.
translation.zh: 但你看 这是我们仅剩的钱了

translation.en: So, we'll buy the clothes, then change.
translation.zh: 去买衣服后 换了身上的

translation.en: You can take anything but my plans
translation.zh: 你可夺去一切 但夺不走我的计划

translation.en: I've got big things to do
I'll be standing right here When you're done

translation.zh: 他们在漫无目的地走动

translation.en: Dude, do you have a problem?
'Cause you've definitely been looking at me for the last four hours
translation.zh: 因为你肯定已盯着我看了四小时

translation.en: and it's starting to freak me out.
And then you blurt that out, just like that?
just play it cool, you know?
Ease yourself into the love game.
translation.zh: 让自己在感情游戏中放松节奏

translation.en: But I do think you're beautiful.
translation.zh: 但我真的认为你很漂亮

translation.en: You're the most beautiful girl I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 你是我见过最漂亮的女孩

translation.en: Okay, just slow your roll, kid. You're...
translation.zh: 好吧 慢点来 小子 你…

translation.en: And I don't understand why this is making you so upset.
translation.zh: 我不明白这为何让你不高兴

translation.en: First of all, I'm not upset.
I am uncomfortable. There's a difference.
translation.zh: 我不自在 这两者有差别
第二 人们不会到处

translation.en: saying what they feel whenever they feel it.
They have guards and shields and other metaphors.
translation.zh: 他们会防备和警惕 或者有其他说法

translation.en: Why? Because we're all messed up
and scared and trying to be something that we're not.
translation.zh: 人们会害怕并且尝试不做自己

translation.en: And if we all went around just declaring our innermost desires
translation.zh: 如果我们都去向让自己心动的人

translation.en: to the exact people we felt them for,
well, then we'd all end up happy or something.
translation.zh: 那我们就都会幸福美满了之类的

translation.en: I'm happy that you think I'm beautiful and...
translation.zh: 我很高兴你觉得我漂亮

translation.en: I've kind of had an amazing time with you,
translation.zh: 而我和你在一起也度过了愉快的时光

translation.en: but the last thing I'm gonna do is actually tell you that.
translation.zh: 但我绝不会直接告诉你

translation.en: -This is-- -I believe the term is euphoria.
translation.zh:
-这是…
-我相信正确的词语是兴喜若狂

translation.en: Hail in the southern desert, extending from Las--
translation.zh:
在南部沙漠会有冰雹
从赌城蔓延至…

translation.en: How did you just become more beautiful in 20 seconds?
translation.zh: 你是如何在20秒内变得更漂亮的？

translation.en: On Mars, people, they didn't do this.
translation.zh: 在火星 没人这样做

translation.en: We just had scientists and they...
I thought about you every day up there.
translation.zh: 我在上面每一天都想着你

translation.en: -What? -I'm gonna fall in love with you.
All my life, I couldn't feel anything.
translation.zh: 我这一生都无法有任何感觉

translation.en: I couldn't feel wind on my face.
translation.zh: 我无法感受到清风拂面

translation.en: That's nothing compared to what I feel with you.
translation.zh: 这一切都比不上我对你的感觉

translation.en: I wouldn't know how to be human.
translation.zh: 我不知该如何做一个正常人
你让我成为了正常人 图萨

translation.en: The tourist lookout is 15 miles that way.
translation.zh: 游客瞭望台在那方向24公里处

translation.en: And we hope we're not intruding, but we're looking for Shaman Neka.
translation.zh:
希望我们没打扰到这里
我们正寻找萨满奈卡
当你遇见时 你自然会知道
我替很多夫妻主持过婚礼

translation.en: Well, there were no state records.
-So, I made this ring 16 years ago. -Stop!
The other half of this ring is with your father.
translation.zh: 戒指的另一半在你父亲那里

translation.en: No, she paid. That's her address.
translation.zh: 不 她付的钱 那是她地址

translation.en: Do you mind if I borrow your computer?
translation.zh:
-介不介意让我用你的电脑？
-用吧
萨默兰市 加利福尼亚州

translation.en: Yeah, that's... and I think that's--
translation.zh: 是 等等 我想那是…

translation.en: Do you know where we're going?
translation.zh: 知不知道我们要去哪里？

translation.en: Hi. We just left the keys in the ignition.
Well, you wanted to see the world.

translation.zh: 这不是真的 知道吗？

translation.en: It's hurting my head to see it like this.
translation.zh: 看到这些让我的头好疼

translation.en: but the world doesn't always give you exactly what you want.
translation.zh: 但这世界不会永远如你所愿

translation.en: All right, let me be cynical for one second.
translation.zh: 好吧 就让我愤世嫉俗一下而已

translation.en: Tulsa, just because your parents are gone,
translation.zh: 图萨 虽然你父母不在了

translation.en: it doesn't mean you can't have a family.
translation.zh: 但这不代表你无法拥有家庭

translation.en: We can be each other's family.
translation.zh: 我们可以成为彼此的家人

translation.en: This isn't real, but we can be real.
translation.zh: 这不是真的 但我们可以是真的

translation.en: I think it's time to go. Let's get you to California.
translation.zh: 我想是时候走了 我们到加州去

translation.en: But, Gardner, I think you're sick.
translation.zh: 加德纳 我看你是病了

translation.en: None of this was how it was in my head.
-You need to go to the hospital. -Except you.
We need to get you to a hospital. Something's wrong with you.
translation.zh: 我需要把你送到医院 你不对劲
好 放射科 急诊

translation.en: I've never seen anything like it before.
Oh, my God, what is that?
I gave him some Valsartan, but...
translation.zh: 我给了他一些缬沙坦 但…
加德纳 我必须走了
社会服务人员很快就来

translation.en: But I'm gonna go to Summerland.
translation.zh: 但是我会去萨默兰市的

translation.en: And I'm gonna tell him how amazing you are.
How much you think about him
and how badly you wanted to go there.
Do you even know why you're sick?
translation.zh: 你到底知不知道你为何病了？

translation.en: -We are going to Summerland. -You can't. They're gonna help you.
translation.zh:
-我们去萨默兰市
-你不能去 他们会帮你治病的
他们不能 你还不明白吗？

translation.en: No matter how much I want Earth,
Hold on a sec. I'll get my bag.
They used a credit card the owner left in the car.
translation.zh: 他们使用车主留在车内的信用卡
他们向北进发 在加利福尼亚州

translation.en: You act like you hate the world so much, Tulsa.
translation.zh: 你假装非常恨这个世界 图萨

translation.en: The beautiful music you make gives you away.
translation.zh: 你创作的那些美妙音乐出卖了你

translation.en: This is the best place I've been so far.
translation.zh: 这是我目前去过最棒的地方

translation.en: Now would be a good time to say something.
Where did you get this photo?
translation.zh: 你从哪里得到这照片的？

translation.en: My mother was Sarah Elliot. She died giving birth to me.
translation.zh:
我妈妈是莎拉埃利奥特
她生我时难产而死

translation.en: Sarah Elliot... died from pressure suit failure.
translation.zh: 莎拉埃利奥特因压力服故障而死

translation.en: That's not-- That's what they said, but...
translation.zh: 那不是…他们是这样说但…

translation.en: Is this some kind of scam?
No, he's not lying. It's the truth, I swear. I just wanted to meet you.
translation.zh:
-不 他没骗你 是真的 我发誓
-我只想见你

translation.en: Why are you doing this to me?
I'm not your father. I'm calling the police.
translation.zh: 我不是你爸爸 我要报警

translation.en: Okay, look, he risked his life
translation.zh: 你看 他一个人冒险

translation.en: to leave the one place he's ever known, all alone,
translation.zh: 离开他唯一知道的地方

translation.en: didn't know anybody, never set foot on this planet.
translation.zh: 不认识任何人 从没来过这星球

translation.en: -What do you want from me? -I mean, how scary is that?
translation.zh:
-你到底想怎样？
-那该有多恐怖啊？

translation.en: I don't know who you are or why you're doing this.
translation.zh: 我不知道你是谁 或为何这样做

translation.en: Because that is you in the photo, and that is this house.
translation.zh: 因为照片上的是你 那个是这屋

translation.en: Our parents left it to us.

translation.zh: 莎拉埃利奥特是我姐姐

translation.en: You gotta get some help. Please, get some help!
translation.zh: 赶紧去找人帮忙 快去！

translation.en: He's not your father. He's your uncle.
translation.zh: 他不是你爸爸 他是你舅舅

translation.en: Okay, let's just go back. He's gonna call the ambulance.
translation.zh: 好 我们回去他会叫救护车

-你会痊愈的
-我妈妈就在这里

translation.en: I can... I can feel her.
I didn't get to choose where I was born.
translation.zh: 我无法选择我的出生地

translation.en: But I get to choose where I die.
translation.zh: 但我可以选择我的埋骨处

translation.en: What's your favorite thing about Earth?
translation.zh: 你最喜欢地球上的什么东西？

translation.en: See you in the funny papers.

translation.zh: 不 加德纳 不要！

translation.en: And she made me wanna give up living when she died.
I knew I would find you.
We have to get him out of our gravity.
translation.zh: 我们必须让他离开地球的引力

translation.en: You have to take the plane higher.
Do you understand what I'm saying?
You know I can't do that.
I'm taking us into the stratosphere.
Although I warn you, one of you may need to take over.
translation.zh:
不过我警告你们
你们当中一人可能要接管

translation.en: One of us may need to...
Yeah, there's a chance that I may die.
All right, let's buckle you in.
Just... yeah, just get ready. Come on. Grab this strap right there.
translation.zh: 做好准备 抓住那个带子
现在由我接管飞机控制权
不 我们要去更高处

translation.en: Are you ever gonna stop slapping me?

translation.zh:
-不 图撒 不要
-我好讨厌
但加德纳 我们都知道

translation.en: It should buy us the time we need.
translation.zh: 这下应该能给我们争取到足够时间
我会想念你的 加德纳

translation.en: More than anything else in the world.
You're the best mom I never had.
translation.zh: 你是我未曾有幸拥有过的最棒的妈妈

translation.en: Miss! Miss, you can't go there.
translation.zh: 小姐 停 你不能上去

translation.en: And I had the time of my life with you.
translation.zh: 而和你共度的时光让我毕生难忘

translation.en: But the last thing I'm gonna do is actually tell you that.
translation.zh: 但我绝不会直接告诉你
倒数 十 九 八

translation.en: So, as you probably know, I've retired from NASA.
translation.zh:
也许你已知道
我从美国航天局退休了

translation.en: I'm running their training program now.
translation.zh: 现在我正管理他们的训练计划

translation.en: I mean, getting re-accustomed to living on this planet's been a little trying.
translation.zh:
要重新习惯地球上的生活
这有点挑战

translation.en: Since I couldn't spend any money on Mars and I was up there for six years,
translation.zh:
由于我无法在火星花什么钱
况且我在那儿也六年了

translation.en: it turns out I actually have a lot of it.
So, I bought a ranch house in Boulder, Colorado.
translation.zh:
所以我在科罗拉多州的
博尔德市买了处农房

translation.en: I like to ski and the people are really nice.
translation.zh: 我喜欢滑雪 那里的人也挺好的

translation.en: Yeah, it's a pretty big house.
Would you like to come live with me there?
translation.zh: 你想不想过来和我一起生活？
有人花钱请你这么做吗？

translation.en: Because I age out in a month.
translation.zh:
因为我下个月
就超过寄养制度的最高年龄了

translation.en: Who said anything about only a month?
I wanted to go to Earth.
Not just to visit, but to live there.
translation.zh: 不只是探访 而是要长居那里

translation.en: people from Earth want exactly the same thing as people from Mars.
translation.zh: 地球人和火星人都要同样的东西

translation.en: And I should know, because I'm pretty sure I'm the only one.
translation.zh:
我早该知道的
因为我肯定只有我一人符合标准

translation.en: I don't know which is better, but here's what I do know.
translation.zh:
我不知道哪个更好
但这就是我所知道的
